*** Settings ***
Documentation
...  We have _formatting_ and <escaping>.\n
...  \n
...  | *Name* | *URL* |\n
...  | Robot  | http://robotframework.org |
Metadata    Escape   this is <b>not bold</b>
Metadata    Format   this is *bold*

*** Test Cases ***
Example
    [Documentation]    *I* can haz _formatting_!!
    No Operation
